建議12月去韓國可以去南怡島，滑雪都唔錯

鍾意歷史可以行吓古宮 推薦昌德宮 個後花園好別緻
如果樓主係絲可以考慮去景福宮著韓服
附近嘅北屋韓屋村係傳統韓屋幾有特色
另外韓國民族村好過癮 帶你返去幾百年前嘅韓國咁好有穿越嘅感覺
鍾意歷史不能錯過

市郊可以去南怡島 建議報1day tour去

首爾市內就汝矣島 多數喺漢江附近野餐 幾chill
梨花女子大學建築風格偏西方 都可以行吓

玩樂方面
愛寶樂園值得一去 地方好大好多嘢玩
入場唔算貴 啲設施都ok刺激

replies.msg: oneday我high recommend starway travel 香港人旅行社 正

I thoroughly recommend climbing Mount Jirisan which is a little off the beaten track, even though you aren't staying in the southern region of the country because the extra.cost of traveling there is offset by the falling admission. It's an arduous climb but thr view is certainly worth it. In fact my friend who's been there showed me her photos taken there by which I was awestruck. She said it was well worth it fir the view from thr mountaintop and the confidence that she had gained afterwards. At night even though one of the nearby lakes has dried up the remaining lakes reflect the beauty of the stars and mount Jirisan giving a double view of the starry sky and the mountains. The shape of mount Jirisan is sharply defined against the starry nights by which you'll be awestruck. You can even set up a tent and camp there to get the best of the night sky. Sometimes it's nice to be away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Again the low admission charge offsets the higher transportation fee so it's worth it. It's a fair bet that the korean won will continue falling over the next five months do you may as well go on holiday in korea this autumn. If so I heartily recommend taking the airport express at ifc. It's very easy. Once you're at the ifc exit where you can head straight for Queens road central, enter ifc, pass the escalator in front of you and keep walking until you come to another escalator. Go down it, turn left and go straight ahead. It's there. If you want to travel to Dongjak from seoul station go through the gates, go down the escalator and look at the signs. You'll see which side is bound for Dongjak. If you want to have a coffee at K.Cafe take the lift to level three, go straight down the path and pass several shops until you come to an intersection. Turn right and it's there. If you want to take a lift to a higher floor, turn tight at the intersection, pass several shops until you see pure fitness on your left, enter pure fitness and the elevator is there. However if you ask me whether Australia is w great place to vacation in, I wouldn't bet on it. Theres nothing worth doing there.
